question: Nepal ko raja haru ko bare ma kunai jankari cha?
context: Nepal ma raja ko pratha 1768 dekhi suru bhayeko ho, jab King Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal lai ekikrit gare. Teti bela bata 2008 samma Nepal ma raja haru ko shasan rahyo.
response: Ho, Nepal ma pahila raja haru thiyo. Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal ekikrit gareko thiyo, ra 2008 samma raja haru ko shasan rahyo.

question: Sagarmatha ko uchai kati cha?

question: Nepal ma total kati ota UNESCO World Heritage Sites chan?

question: Pashupatinath mandir ko bare ma bistar ma bhannu na.

question: Eye check-up ma ke problem dekhiyo?
context: Eye check-up ma patient ko left eye ma 1.5 power dekhiyeko cha. Dry eyes ko complaint cha, ani artificial tears drops din ma 4 patak use garna prescribe gareko cha. Screen time kam garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Left eye ma 1.5 power cha ani dry eyes ko lagi drops prescribe gareko cha.

question: UTI ko barema ke update cha?
context: Patient ko urine test ma UTI confirm cha, ra organism E. coli detect bhayeko cha. Antibiotics ko lagi nitrofurantoin prescribe gareko cha. Pani dherai khana ani spicy food avoid garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: UTI confirm cha, antibiotics prescribe gareko ra pani dherai khana suggest gareko cha.

question: Allergy test ma ke problem dekha cha?
context: Allergy test ma patient lai dust mites ani pet dander allergy confirm cha. Symptoms sneezing, itchy eyes, ra nasal congestion ho. Doctor le antihistamines prescribe gareko ani masks use garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Dust mites ani pet dander allergy cha. Antihistamines khana ra mask lagaauna suggest gareko cha.

question: Head injury ko report ko barema k cha?
context: CT scan ma minor concussion dekhiyeko cha, ani bleeding dekhiyeko chaina. Patient le headache ani dizziness ko complaint cha. Rest garna, bright light avoid garna, ani pain management ko lagi paracetamol lekhiyeko cha.
response: Minor concussion cha, rest garna ani light avoid garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Skin infection ko barema thap janakari dinus.
context: Patient ko skin infection fungal ho, jasko karan itching ani redness cha. Doctor le topical antifungal cream ra din ma ek patak oral antifungal medication prescribe gareko cha. Tight clothing avoid garna strongly suggest gareko cha.
response: Fungal infection cha, antifungal cream ani medication prescribe gareko cha.

question: Recent stroke ko recovery kasto cha?
context: Patient lai 1 mahina agadi minor stroke aako thiyo. Physiotherapy garna suru gareko cha, ani blood thinners jaise aspirin prescribe gareko cha. Regular BP check garna ani low-sodium diet follow garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Stroke pachi recovery ramro cha, physiotherapy ma improvement cha ani aspirin lekhiyeko cha.

question: Patient ko depression ko treatment ma ke cha?
context: Patient ko depression ko lagi SSRI (sertraline) prescribe gareko cha. Weekly therapy sessions attend garna suggest gareko cha. Sleep pattern maintain garna ani stress kam garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Depression ko lagi SSRI prescribe gareko ra weekly therapy suggest gareko cha.

question: Baby ko growth ma ke kura aayo?
context: Baby ko weight 8 kg cha, ani height 72 cm. Doctor le growth normal bhaneko cha. Solid food suru garna ra dherai fruits ani vegetables add garna recommend gareko cha.
response: Baby ko growth ramro cha. Solid food suru garna ra healthy diet suggest gareko cha.

question: Cholesterol report ma ke update cha?
context: Total cholesterol 240 mg/dL cha, LDL 160 mg/dL cha, HDL 35 mg/dL cha. Doctor le atorvastatin start garna bhaneko cha. Saath ma fried food ani saturated fats avoid garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Cholesterol ali badeko cha, atorvastatin lekhiyeko ani oily food avoid garna bhaneko cha.

question: Patient ko asthma control ma cha ki chaina?
context: Patient lai seasonal asthma cha, ani aba inhaler use garera ramro control ma cha. Spirometry test pachi lung function normal aako cha. Doctor le daily preventer inhaler use garna ani emergency ko lagi reliever inhaler sanga rakhna suggest gareko cha.
response: Asthma control ma cha. Preventer inhaler daily use garna bhaneko cha.

question: Patient ko diet chart ko barema k bhaneko cha?
context: Doctor le patient ko weight loss ko lagi high-protein, low-carb diet recommend gareko cha. Breakfast ma boiled eggs ani fruits lincha. Lunch ma grilled chicken ani vegetables cha. Dinner ma light soup suggest gareko cha. Junk food completely avoid garna bhaneko cha.
response: High-protein, low-carb diet follow garna bhaneko cha ani junk food chodna suggest gareko cha.

question: Blood pressure ko lagi recent suggestion ke cha?
context: Recent visit ma BP 140/95 aako cha, jun ali high cha. Doctor le losartan din ma ek patak prescribe gareko cha. Exercise routine ma brisk walk add garna ani stress management ko lagi meditation garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: BP ali high cha. Losartan start garna bhaneko ra exercise routine ma walk add garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Chronic back pain ko barema ke cha?
context: MRI report ma L5-S1 disc degeneration dekhiyeko cha. Pain management ko lagi physiotherapy recommend gareko cha. Saath ma ibuprofen din ma dui patak lincha. Doctor le posture improve garna ani heavy lifting avoid garna strongly suggest gareko cha.
response: Back pain disc degeneration le ho. Physiotherapy garna ani posture improve garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Pregnancy ma folic acid use garna k bhaneko cha?
context: First trimester ma folic acid 400 mcg daily lincha. Doctor le neural tube defect prevent garna ko lagi mandatory bhaneko cha. Saath ma green leafy vegetables diet ma include garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Folic acid daily lincha, ani green vegetables diet ma add garna bhaneko cha.

question: Heartburn ko lagi ke prescribe gare?
context: Heartburn ko complaint ma doctor le omeprazole empty stomach din ma ek patak lincha bhaneko cha. Spicy ani oily food completely avoid garna strongly suggest gareko cha. Pani dherai khanu ani dinner light rakhaune recommend gareko cha.
response: Omeprazole khana suggest gareko cha ani spicy food avoid garna bhaneko cha.

question: Thyroid test ma result ke cha?
context: TSH 7.5 aako cha, jun ali high cha. Free T4 normal range vitra cha. Subclinical hypothyroidism diagnose gareko cha. Doctor le levothyroxine 50 mcg prescribe gareko cha ani 3 mahina pachi repeat test garna suggest gareko cha.
response: TSH high cha, levothyroxine start garna bhaneko ani repeat test garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Diabetes management ma ke suggest gare?
context: Fasting blood sugar 160 mg/dL cha, ani postprandial 210 mg/dL cha. Doctor le metformin din ma dui patak lincha bhaneko cha. Saath ma sugary food completely avoid garna ani daily 30 min walk strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Sugar level high cha. Metformin lincha ani sugary food avoid garna bhaneko cha.

question: Allergy ka symptoms ko lagi ke garna bhaneko cha?
context: Allergy symptoms jastai sneezing, itchy nose ko lagi antihistamine (cetirizine) prescribe gareko cha. Dust exposure avoid garna ani mask lagaauna bhaneko cha. Saath ma room ma air purifier use garna recommend gareko cha.
response: Allergy symptoms ko lagi cetirizine prescribe gareko cha ra dust exposure avoid garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Mental health ko treatment ma kasto progress cha?
context: Patient lai anxiety disorder cha, ani SSRI (escitalopram) din ma ek patak prescribe gareko cha. Therapy sessions ma progress dekhiyecha, ani sleep quality pani improve bhayeko cha. Doctor le daily meditation garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Anxiety ko lagi medication ani therapy bata ramro improvement cha. Meditation garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Skin whitening cream use garna doctor le ke bhaneko cha?
context: Skin pigmentation ko lagi hydroquinone cream prescribe gareko cha, jun din ma ek patak rat ko time ma use garna bhaneko cha. Sun exposure avoid garna ani sunscreen lagaauna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Pigmentation ko lagi cream prescribe gareko ani sunscreen lagaauna suggest gareko cha.

question: Vitamin D deficiency ko lagi ke gareko cha?
context: Vitamin D level 15 ng/mL cha, ani severe deficiency diagnose gareko cha. Doctor le chadai boost garna weekly cholecalciferol 60,000 IU prescribe gareko cha. Sunlight ma daily 20 mins basna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Vitamin D deficiency ko lagi supplements prescribe gareko ani dhoop ma basna bhaneko cha.

question: Baby ko teething pain ko lagi ke suggest gare?
context: Baby ko teething pain ko lagi doctor le chilled teething rings use garna bhaneko cha. Saath ma light gum massage garna ani acetaminophen pain severe bhaye dine recommend gareko cha.
response: Teething pain ko lagi chilled teething rings ra gum massage garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Patient ko fracture recovery kasto cha?
context: Patient ko right wrist fracture ko lagi cast 6 hapta lagi use gareko thiyo. Aba cast hataera physiotherapy suru gareko cha. Pain mild cha, ani grip strength improve huncha bhanera exercise suggest gareko cha.
response: Fracture recovery ramro cha, physiotherapy start gareko ani pain mild cha.

question: Sinus infection ko lagi ke prescribe gare?
context: Sinus infection ma amoxicillin din ma tin patak ani nasal decongestant spray use garna prescribe gareko cha. Steam inhalation garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Sinus infection ko lagi antibiotics ani steam inhalation garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Migraine ko lagi ke suggest gareko cha?
context: Patient lai frequent migraine attacks huncha. Doctor le sumatriptan attacks ko bela ma lincha bhanera prescribe gareko cha. Trigger jastai bright light ani loud noise avoid garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Migraine ko lagi sumatriptan lincha ani triggers avoid garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Patient ko vitamin B12 deficiency ko barema ke cha?
context: Vitamin B12 level 180 pg/mL cha, jun low cha. Doctor le monthly intramuscular injection prescribe gareko cha. Saath ma B12-rich foods jastai eggs, dairy, ani meat khana strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: B12 deficiency cha. Injection lincha ani B12-rich food khana suggest gareko cha.

question: Kidney stone ko lagi ke treatment cha?
context: Ultrasound ma 5mm ko kidney stone dekhiyeko cha. Doctor le pain ko lagi diclofenac prescribe gareko cha. Pani dherai khana ani citrus fruits diet ma include garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Kidney stone cha. Pain ko lagi medicine ra pani dherai khana suggest gareko cha.

question: Anemia ko barema ke update cha?
context: Hemoglobin level 9.5 g/dL cha, jun low cha. Iron deficiency anemia diagnose gareko cha. Doctor le ferrous sulfate tablet prescribe gareko cha ani vitamin C intake badhauna strongly suggest gareko cha.
response: Anemia ko lagi iron tablet prescribe gareko cha ani vitamin C badhauna suggest gareko cha.

question: PCOS ko lagi ke treatment cha?
context: PCOS diagnose pachi doctor le metformin din ma ek patak ani oral contraceptive pills prescribe gareko cha. Lifestyle change ko lagi regular exercise ani balanced diet strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: PCOS ko lagi metformin ani lifestyle changes jastai exercise recommend gareko cha.

question: Child ko fever ko barema update dinus.
context: Baby lai 102°F fever cha, ani paracetamol 6 ghanta gap ma lincha bhaneko cha. Doctor le hydration maintain garna ani cool compress use garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Fever ko lagi paracetamol lekhiyeko cha ani cool compress garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Post-surgery recovery ko barema ke cha?
context: Appendix surgery ko 1 hapta bhayo. Doctor le pain management ko lagi acetaminophen prescribe gareko cha. Stitches clean garna ani spicy food avoid garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Post-surgery recovery ramro cha. Pain ko lagi acetaminophen ani stitches clean garna bhaneko cha.

question: Patient ko cholesterol management ko lagi ke cha?
context: Total cholesterol 220 mg/dL, LDL 140 mg/dL cha. Doctor le atorvastatin din ma ek patak ani low-fat diet follow garna strongly recommend gareko cha. Weekly 5 din 30 minutes exercise garna suggest gareko cha.
response: Cholesterol ko lagi statin lincha ani low-fat diet ra exercise recommend gareko cha.

question: Cough ko treatment ma ke gareko cha?
context: Patient lai 5 din dekhi dry cough cha. Doctor le cough syrup (dextromethorphan) prescribe gareko cha. Saath ma steam inhalation garna ani cold drinks avoid garna strongly suggest gareko cha.
response: Dry cough ko lagi syrup lekhiyeko cha ani steam inhalation garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Pregnancy ma nausea ko lagi ke suggest gare?
context: Patient lai first trimester ma severe morning sickness cha. Doctor le ondansetron din ma ek patak ani light snacks frequently khana bhaneko cha. Spicy food avoid garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Nausea ko lagi ondansetron prescribe gareko cha ani light food khana bhaneko cha.

question: Eczema ko barema k cha?
context: Patient ko hand eczema ko lagi steroid cream prescribe gareko cha. Doctor le moisturizer frequent use garna ani harsh soaps avoid garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Eczema ko lagi cream lekhiyeko cha ani harsh soap avoid garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Elderly patient ko dementia ko barema ke cha?
context: Patient lai mild dementia diagnose gareko cha. Doctor le donepezil din ma ek patak ani memory exercises garna suggest gareko cha. Family le regular interaction ani mental support dinu strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Dementia ko lagi medicine lekhiyeko ani memory exercises garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Acne treatment ma ke suggest gare?
context: Patient ko acne severe cha. Doctor le isotretinoin tablet ani benzoyl peroxide gel use garna prescribe gareko cha. Saath ma oily food avoid garna ani daily face clean garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Acne ko lagi tablet ani gel lekhiyeko cha. Oily food chodna suggest gareko cha.

question: Child ko growth spurt ko barema ke bhaneko cha?
context: Child ko height ani weight ma sudden growth dekhiyeko cha. Doctor le balanced diet follow garna ani daily milk ani fruits khana strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Growth spurt ma balanced diet ra milk fruits khana suggest gareko cha.

question: Heart ko health ko lagi ke recommend gare?
context: Heart health ko lagi doctor le DASH diet follow garna strongly recommend gareko cha. Saath ma daily brisk walk 30 minutes ani BP ko regular monitoring garna bhaneko cha.
response: Heart health ko lagi DASH diet ani brisk walk recommend gareko cha.

question: Insomnia ko barema ke update cha?
context: Patient lai 1 mahina dekhi sleep disturbance cha. Doctor le melatonin din ma ek patak prescribe gareko cha ani sleep hygiene maintain garna suggest gareko cha. Screen time sleep agadi kam garna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Insomnia ko lagi melatonin lekhiyeko cha ani sleep hygiene maintain garna suggest gareko cha.

question: Patient ko post-COVID recovery ma ke cha?
context: Patient le recent COVID bata recovery gareko cha. Weakness ani fatigue ko lagi multivitamins prescribe gareko cha. Saath ma light exercise ani high-protein diet recommend gareko cha.
response: Post-COVID ko lagi vitamins ani light exercise suggest gareko cha.

question: Piles ko treatment ma ke cha?
context: Patient lai grade 2 piles cha. Doctor le stool softener prescribe gareko cha. Spicy food avoid garna ani daily fiber intake badhauna strongly recommend gareko cha.
response: Piles ko lagi stool softener ani fiber intake badhauna suggest gareko cha.
